content.content: This is an EIP specification for revert reasons that can be captured in the API. It is a light implementation than https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/838#issuecomment-379238333 Motivation
content.GPT-summary: The post is an EIP specification for revert reasons that can be captured in the API. The author is explaining the proposal and its motivation. A previous implementation is referenced, but the author is not asking for feedback or collaboration. However, the post could be subject to constructive criticism from third parties.
